page.title: 04SHOPS
page.content: The shops are found in several small groups each serving mainly local needs for a residential area.These shopping parades are on Princess Road between Mauldeth Road and the railway bridge;at the junction of Egerton Road South and St.Werburgh's Road;on Sandy Lane;on Wilbraham Road between Ellesmere Road and the railway bridge.On this last length is the only church (St.Ninians URC), and the only dentist and veterinary surgeon. This area and the first one are the only ones which have a doctor's surgery.
